plugins.name: PDF Editor
plugins.description: Professional PDF editing plugin for rotating pages, updating links, and adding company branding. Perfect for fixing legacy documents with outdated internal links and page orientation issues.
plugins.longDescription:
The PDF Editor plugin provides comprehensive PDF manipulation capabilities through a single, intuitive interface. It enables you to:

â€¢ Rotate specific pages to fix orientation issues
â€¢ Replace all instances of old URLs/text with new ones (e.g., updating legacy wiki links)
â€¢ Add company branding images to footers consistently across all pages
â€¢ Combine multiple operations in a single command

Perfect for organizations managing legacy documents with outdated internal links or incorrect page orientations. Supports PDF files that have been scanned, OCR'd, or previously printed.

Example use cases:
- Fix archived team wiki links after migration (e.g., team-wiki.local â†’ team-wiki.etc.com)
- Correct page orientation in batches of scanned documents
- Add company branding to existing PDFs
- Combine rotation, link updates, and branding in one operation
plugins.author: Your Team

skills.name: PDF Editor
skills.description: Enables PDF editing including page rotation, URL/text replacement, and footer branding. This skill should be used when users want to edit PDFs by rotating pages, replacing links/text (such as updating old wiki URLs to new ones), and adding company branding images to footers. Ideal for fixing legacy documents with outdated links or correcting page orientation issues.

screenshots.title: PDF Rotation Example
screenshots.description: Rotate specific pages to fix orientation

screenshots.title: Link Replacement
screenshots.description: Automatically update all old wiki links to new URLs

screenshots.title: Footer Branding
screenshots.description: Add company logo to footer on all pages

features: Add images to footer for branding
